A frontend application with multiple pages: base, ranking, store, train, workers, upgrades, bank, messages, and reports
A page for players to select from four races: Humans, Dragonborns, Elves, and Dwarfs, each with unique attributes
A resource management system displaying gold, iron, wood, and wheat quantities
A city upgrade system allowing players to enhance their base infrastructure
A worker management page to assign and upgrade workers
A military training page to recruit and upgrade soldiers
A store interface for purchasing resources, items, or upgrades
A banking system for managing resource storage and interest
A messaging system for player communication
A battle system enabling players to engage in combat with others
A ranking page displaying player scores and positions
A reports page showing historical activity and battle outcomes
A backend API to serve dynamic game data to the frontend
A PostgreSQL database connection configured with specified environment variables
A package.json configuration enabling `npm run install:all` and `npm run dev` commands
